scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run tree; npm run script; npm run style; npm run template; npm run rename; npm run replace
scripts.rename: export VERSION=`npm run version | tail -n 1`; mv dist/main.css "dist/tpce-${VERSION}.css"; mv dist/main.js "dist/tpce-${VERSION}.js"; mv dist/main.html "dist/tpce-${VERSION}.html"
scripts.replace: export VERSION=`npm run version | tail -n 1`; sed -i "" "s/{{VERSION}}/${VERSION}/g" "dist/tpce-${VERSION}.html"; sed -E -i "" "s/tpce\-v[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.html/tpce-${VERSION}.html/g" README.md test/desktop.html test/mobile.html
